title: Moto Racer 15th Anniversary v1.0 (Full)
description:
The definitive motorbike game series is back!

Discover the new free version of Moto Racer 15th Anniversary, including a free race in GP and Super Cross mode.

Moto Racer is back with a new version, including all-new gyroscopic gameplay and even fiercer opponents than before!

EVERY MOTORBIKING CATEGORY IN ONE GAME

- MOTO GP Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Hit speeds of over 300km/h as you race flat out against the toughest of rivals!
- SUPERCROSS Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Go head-to-head with your rivals in all-terrain races and tease them with your fanciest tricks.
- FREESTYLE Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Pull off amazing Superman Seat Grabs, Indy Backflips and Can Cans as you fly through the air.

GAME MODES

- CHAMPIONSHIP - Win the first place in 3 difficulty modes.
- SINGLE RACE Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Challenge the racing drivers at any time in a single race.
- TIME ATTACK - Establish the best records.

FEATURES:

- 2 types of controls (Accelerometer, Touch controls)
- 4 Cameras (Near, Far, Gyroscopic camera, Cockpit)
- 3 levels of difficulty (Beginner, Expert, Confirmed)
- 3 game modes: Championship, Single Race, Records
- Assisted braking available
- Graphic settings

What's New: (October 15, 2013)

COMPLETE CHANGE OF PILOTING GAMEPLAY
- Concentrate on the race and check essential information with just a glance

NEW DRIVING SETTINGS
- Automatic acceleration mode so you can concentrate on steering like a pro.

NEW, COMPLETELY REVISED AI
- 8 opponents instead of 3

CIRCUITS UPDATED
- Fewer hairpin bends, more straight lines, and wide curves to take at full speed!

FULL REWORKING OF MENUS AND NAVIGATION
- Starting a race has never been quicker or easier!
